pkgpurl 0.0.9015
  • Reference

pkgpurl package configuration metadata

Source: R/pkgpurl.gen.R
pkg_config.Rd

A tibble with metadata of all possible pkgpurl package configuration options. See pal::pkg_config_val() for more information.

pkg_config

Format

A tibble with the columns key, default_value and description.

Examples

pkgpurl::pkg_config
#> # A tibble: 3 × 3
#>   key                  default_value description                                
#>   <chr>                <list>        <chr>                                      
#> 1 add_copyright_notice <NULL>        Whether or not to add a **copyright notice…
#> 2 add_license_notice   <NULL>        Whether or not to add a **license notice**…
#> 3 gen_pkgdown_ref      <NULL>        Whether or not to overwrite [pkgdown][pkgd…
